translations: n．窃贼，偷窃者：从他人处偷窃财物的人。
· The police caught the stealers red-handed.

sentences.sentence: Follow it up with specific questions, such as scene stealers and actors in the flick.
sentences.translation: 接着问些具体的问题，比如谁最抢戏，片中的演员等等。

sentences.sentence: Abstract:The book "soul stealers: the Chinese sorcery scare of 1768" was written by a well-known American Sinologist Philip A.
sentences.translation: 摘要：《叫魂——1768年中国妖术大恐慌》一书是著名的美国汉学家孔飞力先生的著作。

sentences.sentence: But in this world there will be dream stealers, dream snatchers and dream killers that will squash your dream, extinguish and snuff it out of existence.
sentences.translation: 但在这个世界上还有偷梦者、夺梦者、杀梦者来捣碎你的梦想，扑灭并扼杀你的梦想，让它不复存在。
